Mocking Tension

Dimly lit room, two men face off.  
Svidrigaïlov smirks, tension rising.  
Svidrigaïlov: “Your sister can’t endure me.”  

Raskolnikov clenches fists, defiant.  
Raskolnikov: “She doesn’t love you, that’s clear.”  

Svidrigaïlov laughs, eyes narrowing.  
Svidrigaïlov: “You can never be sure of secrets.”  

---
Same room, Svidrigaïlov’s demeanor shifts.  
Svidrigaïlov: “Am I afraid? Nonsense!”  

Raskolnikov glares, suspicion growing.  
Raskolnikov: “You still have designs on Dounia.”  

Svidrigaïlov grins, pouring champagne wildly.  
Svidrigaïlov: “Damn the wine! Water!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov expresses mockery and ambiguity regarding his relationship with Avdotya Romanovna, hinting at hidden motives.
